snippet.title: Fred pyramid adventure with POKEs for Commodore 64
snippet.description:
Fred, Quicksilva/Indescomp, 1984 Commodore 64 version
This game is about Fred, an archaeologist, who likes to look for treasures and explore pyramids. Along the way Fred will meet ghosts, mummies and other enemies guarding the pyramid. The game includes cheat POKEs for the game.

Familiar game music maybe? You may remember this song also from the game Highnoon. Here is a video for comparison:
https://youtu.be/mpZ5v0_9hWc

My video of Cuthbert game series on C64, presenting all 4 games:
https://youtu.be/bTh48WIe4EM

If you liked this video, you may also like my Hard Hat Mack video:
https://youtu.be/E4lCMX4C7LE

Or, my Legend of Sinbad video:
https://youtu.be/CeSx-aYWKLo

Cheat POKEs require a reset switch. If you don't have a reset switch in your Commodore 64, you may be interested checking my instruction video, how to build one:
https://youtu.be/MSjNiZEv3Hs

My channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtghpxSD6kGex7nqSNIXLMw
